attributes.action: Raise the threshold of inheritance tax to 1 million pounds to reflect the increase in house prices that now affect ordinary people.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: House prices have increased over the last few years and now very modest properties are valued at above the inheritance tax threshold. The money to pay for these properties has been taxed throughout the life of the Morgage, as no relief is now available on Mtg. payments, so in effect tax is being paid twice for the same value, which is unfair. Raising the threshold to 1 million would go some way to redressing the inequity in the tax and would take away the burden from most ordinary families on low incomes.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Raise the threshold of inheritance tax to 1 million pounds to reflect the increase in house prices that now affect ordinary people."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
